document.full_text: president barack obama's new plan to expand oil production in the gulf of mexico and alaska is an attempt to deflate republican criticism that he's not doing enough to expand drilling and appeal to voters as they struggle with high energy cost.
document.title: obama oil plan aims to hush rancor in congress
lines_and_colors: president barack obama's new plan to expand oil production in the gulf of mexico and alaska is an attempt to deflate republican criticism that he's not doing enough to expand drilling and appeal to voters as they struggle with high energy cost.
